sentences.en: He enjoys polemics, persuasion, and controversy.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢辩论、说服和争议。

sentences.en: I do not say much because when I talk there are always polemics.
sentences.cn: 我说话比较少,那是因为如果我的话总会引起评论.

sentences.en: The modes of propaganda are opportunistic and the polemics can be vicious.
sentences.cn: 宣传的模式是投机取巧的,诡辩是可恶性的.

trans.tran_cn: 辩论术，辩论法，争论( polemic的名词复数 )，辩论，辩论术，辩论法
trans.tran_en: the art or practice of dispute or argument, as in attacking or defending a doctrine or belief
